title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Exploring Fairness in Federated Learning—Systematic Analysis and Practical Application

context.prior_knowledge: Machine Learning Fundamentals, Statistical Analysis, Understanding of Distributed Systems
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain the two dimensions of fairness in federated learning environments (collaborative fairness, model fairness).
Learners can write a report evaluating model performance using fairness measurement metrics (individual/group fairness).
Learners can design fairness-enhanced federated learning algorithms by applying pre-/in-/post-processing techniques.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
